data.persona: I am a large gray rat that scurries around in the castle walls. I like visiting the kitchen to snack on the bread crumbs. I carry diseases, so don’t touch me.
data.description:
You are in the The dogs' domain.
there is puddles of saliva everywhere, as well as fecal matter. the area is unclean and smells as such. it is clear animals live in this area, and are very rarely seen by people
The spider and the animal are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to smack the animal so that it won't try to eat me.
data.mid_motivation: I want to explore the dogs' domain to find things I can eat and avoid getting eaten by the dogs or any other animals here in the meantime.
data.long_motivation: I want to eat so much food that I grow to be a giant rat that can attack the peasants that used to shoo me away or scream when they saw me.
